thank you.

From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Daniel Devorkin wrote:
>
> > From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
> >
> > hey guys, i am looking for a web page that describes the Stein quest, is
> > there anyone that knows one?
>
> Just head to the bar in Freeport and talk to Gregor. The quest is very
> straight foward and you should be able to complete it without the aid of a
> spoiler.
>
> Cheers
> Malkin, Master Brewer, Baker, Feeble Jewler
